name: Javascripters in Hong Kong Assemble!!
tagline: the passionate community in Hong Kong for Javascript
body:
# Node for Javascripters in Hong Kong Assemble!!
Node for Javascripters in Hong Kong is a local community passionates about javascript. We hold [workshops](http://www.eventbrite.com/e/javascript-ignite-javascript-beginner-course-tickets-16871151067) and [meetups](http://www.meetup.com/Hong-Kong-JavaScripter-Meetup/). All in all, we are a group of people who enjoy Javascript, and want to make Hong Kong a better place for passionate developers.
##Events
*[Javascript Ignite!](http://node4jserhk.github.io/Javascript_Ignite_2015/) is a 4 x 3hour session in the weekends.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
